tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We started checking with doctor 1.5 year back when we are struggling to conceive. We got the reference of dr usha from one of the hospital admin of Bangalore who himself handles one world class hospital (other than specialist) .... He suggested to check with her ....

We started taking consultation and day after other,  with each visit our trust became stronger with doctor...

She has a midas touch.... Today we are blessed with A Healthy baby girl Who is 5days old. It was normal delivery....both mum and daughter are fine..
She is humble and this type of doctor are really blessings for mankind. She is honest in her opinion and consultation charges are very modest looking at her service and other corporate hospitals...

May god bless Usha and her family..... May she prosper and earn good name and fame in her field...

Thank you all and best of luck to all readers of my review...

If anybody wants my reference, practo please feel free to share my no

Complete explanation of the process and planning. Explain the complete cycle of pregnancy with a diagram explanation.

review: I consulted Dr Usha for my second pregnancy. Before this I had 2 misconceptions. Dr. Usha was very positive and very supportive. She is humble and a great human being. She is polite and addresses patients with care and provides comfort. **** ***** * *** **** ******** Thanks a lot for your support Dr Usha. Keep the good work going.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Usha MR is excellent gynecologist and obstetrician . Took good care of pregnancy . Diet advice during Gestational diabetes was very good and help reduce the sugar level. 
Also on the D-day was very much monitoring the expectant mother and took the right decisions at the right time.
Would recommend the doctor for her sklis and friendliness and advices during post delivery. 

Nagalakshmi and Mithun

** **** ********* ** *** ** *** **** ************* ******* * **** ****  **** ******* her simplicity is the best part about her. Dr Usha was very friendly explains well, answers every questions makes us feel very comfortable. I am very happy with the doctor and recommend everyone to her. Trust me she has magical hands . review:
Dr. Usha is very friendly and understands patient state of mind and guides appropriately. She listens to the patient very patiently and give enough time during consultation.
I recommend Dr. Usha to all would be mothers.
